game.title: Save the Princess
game.objective: Rescue the princess from the evil dragon
game.description: The princess has been captured by an evil dragon and needs to be rescued. Find the dragon's lair and defeat the dragon to save the princess.
game.reward: A bag of gold and the princess' gratitude

tasks.description: Travel to the mountains and search for clues to find the dragon's lair
Use your sword and shield to fight the dragon and rescue the princess
